name: Basic Ping Pong game. (BETA)!
description:
Classic ping pong game that is free and open source.

Its only on Linux but will soon will go to Raspberry Pi 64 bit and FreeBSD.

Working progress.

End of life: 13th of August 2024

Controls:

W and S for player one.

UP arrow and Down arrow player two. :)

Thanks Jonathan Steadman.
